courses.title: HTML
courses.description: Learn the foundation of web development by building structured and semantic web pages using HTML. Perfect for beginners starting their frontend journey.Beginner

courses.title: CSS
courses.description: Learn how to style and design websites using CSS. Work with layouts, colors, fonts, and responsive design to create visually appealing pages.

courses.title: JAVASCRIPT
courses.description: Learn JavaScript fundamentals to make websites interactive. Understand variables, functions, conditions, loops, and DOM manipulation.

courses.title: REACT
courses.description: Learn React to build fast and reusable user interfaces. Understand components, props, state, and modern frontend development practices.

courses.title: NODE JS
courses.description: Learn Node.js to run JavaScript on the server and build backend applications, handle requests, then create simple APIs.

courses.title: EXPRESS JS
courses.description: Learn Express.js to build RESTful APIs and backend services. Learn routing, middleware, and server-side application structure.
